attributes.content: It's your turn to move.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If you can kill me here, all of my forces will collapse.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It would be such a pity if you refused to even have a chat with me. Please, come kill me - if you can, that is.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: The enemy's attacks are too overwhelming! We can't afford to drag this out any longer!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: The situation is quite straightforward - only one of us will survive.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I promise to keep my last words short, Madam, as long as you can make me say them.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Do you think yourself a martyr?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nobody will remember you after you die. Being dead and being respected are two completely different matters. What matters is what you've done in life, not how you die.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I obviously wish for nothing more than to play with worthwhile foes, and then to die a worthwhile death.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But I don't think you'll be able to help me fulfill my desires after all. You will suffer a terrible defeat, Madam. Now it's my turn to point out the situation that you're in.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Your confidence was built upon the fall of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But this isn't Chernobog, nor is this the ruthless land of Ursus.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The mighty Lungmen will not fall into the hands of scum like you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well said.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Faust.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: GROOAAAAAR!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Was that a slash? N-no, impossible! Could this be... Arts?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Back off.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What... How can this be?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: (Groans in anguish)
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Don't be afraid!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It won't hurt you. There's no need to be afraid.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: UNNGGHHH...
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (He's too far. It's only going to get harder for me to close the gap. I'm at a disadvantage if this drags out.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your skills are formidable.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You used your Arts to detonate Faust's attack in advance, and broke through my formation. Your blade even cut through my guard's neck and almost reached me.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If I had let you come a few steps closer, you would have cut me in half. Not even Faust would've been able to stop you.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You won't be so lucky next time.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Unfortunately, there won't be a next time. Your secret has been exposed, Madam.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You've heard the saying - never try the same trick twice. You can't fool your audience again after the secret comes out.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: The distance between us is greater than your Arts' range, isn't it?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: The rooftop is only so big. You don't have much room to move back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How much closer can you get?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Faust, show her what real Arts are.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I know your position all too well. An exposed sniper poses no...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You are remarkable, Madam Ch'en. Are you able to cut through any shot fired at you? Just like before, I could barely even see your movements.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Sniper, I was attacked by you and someone from 3 o'clock simultaneously. But there's nobody in that direction.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I doubt you're that kind of caster.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There's no need for you to try to guess, Officer. You won't figure it out.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Now, how many shots will you be able to deflect? Ten? Forty? A hundred?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But, how about the shrapnel? The blast? What about the Arts inside?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Are you able to stop all of it?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Nonsense.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then, let's keep going!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Officer, I know what you are. My Originium Arts only work on the Infected.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I don't care.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't you know that you're only going to become his pawn, to be discarded when you've served your purpose?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You can have those words back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We will give you a chance. Lungmen will not.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, I'm afraid we'll have to make our way down! We can't deal with the enemy's fierce attacks!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: (Tsk... As soon as I want to move, the sniper will attack me from all directions. Just how is he doing that...?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (I can neutralize his ranged attacks, but if I let him keep wearing me down, I won't last long.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (I'll have to seize victory in a single decisive moment...!)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't care what you have to say. I don't have time to listen to your blathering.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (I can see a red aura congealing around her. She's about to use her Arts.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (Mephisto, according to the plan, if I shoot her now, she'll have to stop her casting or she'll die in the explosion.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: But wouldn't this be the best opportunity to break her spirit? Hold your fire, and just watch her first.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We will miss our opportunity.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Broader strategic goals are more important than the specific tactics used to get there, Faust.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Come with me! Don't stay here anymore!
Do you not want to leave here? Let's get far, far away from these people, and this place!
Do you really not know? He's the reason why all the adults treat us like this! It's all his fault!
I hate this accursed city. I hate him. Don't make me hate you too.
Chi Xiao—
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: —Unsheathe!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Guards, form a line! Stop her!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: EEEEAAAAAARRRGHH!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (N-no! I lost control of Chi Xiao? Why now of all times?!)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Her Arts paused. Her casting failed.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Faust, now.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Command, fire.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Damn it... Scatter!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What a terrifying weapon.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Just the dispersion of your Arts was powerful enough to block all the bolts, as well disable three of my guards.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But you were still hit by the blast, weren't you?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Ugh... Gahh...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (One rib, no, two are broken? I can endure it. But this firepower... There's no way I can take another...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's just like our leader said.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Madam, it's not that you don't want to kill me. You cannot unsheathe that sword.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: What did you say? Who told you that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You should know this name, Madam Ch'en. As you said, this sword was not to be meant to be used against someone like me. Your recklessness disrupted its intended mechanism.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If we seized the opportunity to attack you while you were defenseless, you would have already been turned into dust. She already knows all your weaknesses.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You waste your breath.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We will destroy this world as it currently is.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If we allow the rampant corruption to grow, the entire world will rot away.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Only by cutting it all away can these rusted cities break free from their chains and be born anew.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: GRAAAAAAGHHH!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Herd

attributes.content: Out of my way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Come, Madam Ch'en. Aren't you also very disappointed in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Our leader is waiting for you. There's no reason why you need to bow your head to Lungmen, is there?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I have my duties.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That has nothing to do with which side you take. While you keep talking about these mundane 'duties,' you know just how our fellow peoples are being treated.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Just give me a sign, then I'll call off the attack immediately. Come, join us. Let us work towards the greater good together.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: *Spits*. This mouthful of blood is the only sign I have for you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What kind of noble goals could Reunion possibly have if they hire a lowlife like you? Spare me your nonsense!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So, that's how it's going to be. If you don't believe me, then that's your loss.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You can spend your last moments squirming all you want. My guardian and his bolts will show you the true power of the Infected.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You are all alone, while we are united and strong. Your death will be fitting.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Save those rotten words until after you're dead.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Or, you could forcefully activate the Originium Arts imbued in that sword. Something terrible will happen, right? I'll let you decide your own fate.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Do you think you'll get a hero's death?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Listen, brat. When one dies, nothing is left behind.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I have to sacrifice myself to kill you...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll do it, even though it's not worth it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We have nothing more to talk about then. Goodbye, Madam Ch'en. Faust.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Command, f—
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't need to go that far, Madam Ch'en!
What's that?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: A helicopter? No, that doesn't look like one. It's...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Blaze, jump!
Mind your landing posture! Don't leave my heat flow!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What's that? Someone's jumping down?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: 'As terror rises, her eyes become blind…'
Damn, Rhodes Island? From above?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: These black lines... Wait, is that you...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: '...As the tears dry, she weeps silently.'
...Nghh...
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: ...Nngh, uuughhh...
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Ughh.... Aaaargh! Ugh!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: What's going on here? Why are my guards screaming as if they're grieving?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: My Arts should have wiped all their emotions, so why? What's going on?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Is that you?!! Damn you!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: The Rabbit of Rhodes Island!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I temporarily restricted their movement, but it'll only last for about ten seconds!
That's more than enough time for me to make a safe zone!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Let's do it, Blaze!
Are we ready to go all out?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yes, now!
We're about to land - your bottom might get a little sore!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't drop me!
Of course!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Command, fire!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Don't underestimate us!
...My bolts were diverted by the wind? How could this...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Cut the roof apart from underneath those Reunion troops!
Sure thing, but make sure to hold on tight! I can only do this once every few months!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Uh... Urgh?
attributes.name: Mephisto's Herd

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaghh!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Herd

attributes.content: She cut a huge crack through the roof of the building!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: I know. Watch out for falling debris!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's going on here? How'd she do that? What happened?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Woah, a lot of Reunion's forces fell onto this level!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Forget them, hold on tight!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Hello, hello?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You don't need to be in such a hurry to get yourself killed.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We're in the middle of a crisis. What are you doing on this channel?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, I just wanted to tell you that I'm done with my mission.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has something really powerful, and they'll be here with it soon.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They're already here. What was this mission of yours anyway?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Coordinating with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Safe landing!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, you can put me down.
You... you guys...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en!
Amiya...!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sorry it took us so long to get here, Madam Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In accordance to our agreement, Rhodes Island will now be supporting you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A few minutes ago...
4:21 AM \ Overcast
Call Sign: 'Bad Guy', 40m above L.G.D. Headquarters, Upper Lungmen

attributes.options: All right, it's time for your debut!;...Go forth.;Look at that sorry shape she's in. She needs your help, Amiya.

attributes.content: Why are you so enthusiastic about this? She left you to die in that ruined city, so isn't it only right to let her wallow in her helplessness?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, don't be like that. Dr. {@nickname} is right. We have to resolve Lungmen's problem first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Otherwise, everything we've done will have been for naught.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Fine, if that's an order, I'll do it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But to be honest, I don't really want to help that woman.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, we can't let all our efforts over the last three months go to waste.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hitting me with the cost versus benefit, huh? Whatever, I just have to do it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Some things can wait until after Lungmen is safe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When that time comes, we're gonna make a fortune!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I mean, we look like we've been beaten up even worse than her, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What a pain. I didn't expect that woman in the ruined city to be so arrogant. Kal'tsit never even gave me a heads up...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'll treat you to curry after we get back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can take some time to rest up afterwards. But right now, we need to put an end to this battle once and for all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All right, we have a deal. Let's go!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why are you bunch here?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We have to be here, Mephisto.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What the hell is FrostNova doing? What's going on with her anyway? Did she pass out again?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You accursed rabbit... You and your entire rabble were supposed to freeze to death in Chernobog!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I cannot die yet.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as Oripathy continues to plague these lands, our battle will never end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We will rid the world of psychopaths like you, as well as the persecution that the Infected face!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Aha... Ahaha...!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Come, little rabbit, if I am your enemy, then come kill me! Kill me! Kill me right now!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: No... You are not my enemy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then I will slaughter you!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If you seek a glorious death, you will not find it here. I only wish to destroy your hatred and malice.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What happens to you is of no concern to me. But look at the Infected around you. Your death will bring nothing to them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You...!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I have no empathy to spare for the likes of you, at least for the time being.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you trying to make an enemy out of Reunion, out of all of us? Do you want to taste how deep the wrath of the Infected runs?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Not all Infected are the same. You and Miss FrostNova have nothing in common. Not everyone in Reunion is a psychopath like you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What did she tell you? That woman...!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Aren't you misunderstanding something?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I am the one who can control these cities and bend all these pawns to my will! Not her!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: That's why... If someone has to bring you to justice, then I will be the one to do it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's right. Plus, weren't we enemies long ago?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We became enemies the moment you began to spread terror and tragedy!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, please hold on a bit longer. Our support squad will be there shortly.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...There's too much noise. I didn't hear your battle plan, Madam Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hah. I know.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Give us your orders, Madam Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yen has an old saying, 'to catch bandits, you must first catch the ringleader.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: In other words, if we want to destroy our enemies, we have to capture their commander first.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Be careful. His mindless minions will rise up again and again.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Free them from their suffering if you can.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Underestood. I’ll issue commands from the rear.

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Blaze, I'll break their formation with my Arts. I'm counting on you to push back their attacks!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have to take some of the pressure off from Madam Ch'en!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's certainly strong, but do you think she's that strong? Do you think she can take down those two by herself? I highly doubt it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I trust that the Doctor's leadership will help her get the job done.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll be engaging the enemy commander next.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.options: You'll need help to clear the way, right? No problem!;...;I'll give you an opportunity to get to the enemy commander.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Regardless of what I said before, you have my trust this time.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, are you in cahoots with Lungmen now?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Now that I'm seeing this for myself, I'm starting to realize how shameful this is for us Infected.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It only took four of us to drive you into the corner. The only shameful thing here is you!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Mephisto, your atrocities end here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Faust! Wipe them out, every single one! Get them out of my sight!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: It's time to end this battle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Only then... can we prepare for the next one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your orders, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.options: Assist Madam Ch'en, and reclaim the L.G.D. Headquarters!
